briefTitle: Study of Naltrexone-Induced Blockade of Antidepressant Effects
officialTitle: Naltrexone-induced Blockade of Neural Responses Induced by Fast-Acting Antidepressant Effects

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.measure: BOLD Responses in the rACC Cortex During the Processing of Contextual Cues at Baseline (Post-placebo)
primary.description: In order to identify the neural correlates of contextual processing, we examined changes in blood oxygenation level-dependent (BOLD) signal during the post-placebo fMRI scanning session.

primary.measure: Naltrexone-induced Changes in BOLD Responses in the rACC Cortex During the Processing of Contextual Cues (Placebo vs. Naltrexone)
primary.description: In order to identify naltrexone-induced changes in the neural correlates of contextual processing, we examined changes in blood oxygenation level-dependent (BOLD) during the fMRI scanning session between Naltrexone vs. placebo pill.
